comment: Glowing report from AQA about our EPQ results . " It was clear that the Centre encouraged students to pursue their own interest and this is very much in the spirit of the Extended Project Qualification ...
amr:
# ::snt Glowing report from AQA about our EPQ results . " It was clear that the Centre encouraged students to pursue their own interest and this is very much in the spirit of the Extended Project Qualification ...
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / report-01
            :ARG0 (o / organization
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "AQA"))
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG2-of (r2 / result-01
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "EPQ"))
                  :ARG1-of r2)
            :poss (w / we))
      :ARG0-of (s / show-01)
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (c / clear-06
                  :ARG1 (e / encourage-01
                        :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Centre"))
                        :ARG1 (p / person
                              :ARG0-of (s2 / study-01))
                        :ARG2 (p2 / pursue-01
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (ii / interest-01
                                    :ARG1 p))))
            :op2 (s3 / spirit
                  :mod (q / qualify-02
                        :ARG2 (p3 / project)
                        :ARG1-of (e2 / extend-01))
                  :domain e
                  :mod (m2 / much
                        :degree (v / very)))))

comment: As a result there was a range of ambitious projects . It was also clear that the Centre was very supportive of their students and this was seen across the board where there were clearly interesting and supportive structures in place so students can make informed choices ...
amr:
